attributes.action: Establish a cross party group to assess the needs of the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: To establish a cross party group to assess the needs of the NHS. Following consultation with medical professions to make recommendations that will ensure the  health service is able to provide a high level of care that will be sustained in the future. To make recommendations that may require substantial change in order to achieve these goals.
attributes.background: All political parties stop using the problems that the NHS faces for political gain, politicians should work together to improve the NHS for patients and employees of the service. Stop point scoring and blaming, instead work towards a sustainable high level of health care for everyone.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
